      • activation

        public static Vector activation(Matrix w,
                                Vector x,
                                Vector b)
                         throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Calculates activation (w*x+b) for a weights matrix and an input vector. Input matrix and vectors are not modified.
        Parameters:
        w - Weights matrix
        x - Input vector
        b - Bias vector
        Returns:
        Activation vector
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - If unable to calculate the activation vector

        public double L2_norm()
        Calculates the L2 norm (sum of all squared values) for this matrix.
        Returns:
        L2 norm

      • shift_columns

        public Matrix shift_columns()
        For each column, subtracts the values by the max value of that column resulting in all values being less than or equal to zero.
        Returns:
        Result matrix

      • normalize

        public void normalize()
        Normalizes each column in the vector so the sum of each column is 1.

      • calc_dscores

        public Matrix calc_dscores(Vector y)
        Calculates the dscores matrix from normalize log probabilities vector.
        Parameters:
        y - Correct class labels
        Returns:
        Dscores matrix

        r - Row number to append to
        scale - Constant to scale the vector

      • backprop_relu

        public void backprop_relu(Matrix scores)
        Backpropagates the ReLU non-linearity into the gradients matrix. All gradient values are set to 0 if the corresponding activation value is 0.
        Parameters:
        scores - Activation matrix
